call.name: Ufone Daily Pakistan Offer
call.desc:
Yes! surf the internet for free & make all the calls you want 24 hours with Ufone’s massive ‘Daily Pakistan Offer’.
With this exciting offer the entire Pakistan will stay connected through Pakistan’s favorite cellular company – Ufone. So carry on surfing mobile internet & making calls to all Ufone as well as PTCL & Vfone numbers, anywhere in Pakistan for just Rs. 18 (Incl Tax) daily, and that too for 24 hours.

call.name: Ufone Beyhisaab Offer
call.desc: With Ufone Beyhisaab Offer Enjoy unlimited calls to Ufone, PTCL & Vfone numbers for a whole day in just Rs. 14.5 (incl. tax).

call.name: Ufone Best Day Offer
call.desc:
Poora din, poori raat ab hogi baat srif Rs. 11.99+Tax.
With Ufone Best Day Offer, customers can enjoy 500 Mins  (U-U & PTCL) and 500 MBs for Facebook.

call.name: Ufone 24 Ghantay Package
call.desc:
With the 24 Ghantay Offer, in just Rs. 8.99+ tax, Ufone customers can make as many calls as U want throughout the entire day for non-stop communication.
This is an offer the competition can’t possibly match because U will be able to call not only all Ufone numbers, but millions of PTCL and Vfone numbers as well!

call.name: Ufone 3Pe3 Package
call.desc: With Ufone 3pe3 package, you get unlimited calls to Ufone, PTCL and Vfone numbers all over Pakistan for the next 2 hours (except between 5pm and 9pm) in just Rs. 6 inclusive of tax.

call.name: Ufone Super Minutes
call.desc: Ufone Super Minutes brings to you 100 all-network minutes for just Rs. 135 (load), so you can make calls with total ease for 7 calendar days.

call.name: Ufone Asli Chappar Phaar Offer
call.desc:
Ufone presents the Asli Chappar Phaar Offer (Power Pack Offer).
With the Ufone Asli Chappar Phaar Offer (Power Pack Offer) in your hands, you will get an incredible 100 Ufone to Ufone minutes, 100 SMS to all local networks and 1000 MB mobile Internet (for both 2G and 3G customers) to use and enjoy as U see fit!
All this for just Rs. 120 (Including Taxes)

call.name: Ufone Weekly Pakistan Offer
call.desc:
Yes! Surf the internet for free & make all the calls you want 24 hours a day, seven days a week with Ufone’s massive ‘Weekly Pakistan Offer’.
With this exciting offer the entire Pakistan will stay connected through Pakistan’s favorite cellular company – Ufone.
So carry on calling to all Ufone as well as PTCL & Vfone numbers, anywhere in Pakistan for just Rs. 100 (Incl all applicable tax) / week.

call.name: Ufone Super Card Gold
call.desc: Ufone Super Card Gold comes with a price of 999 PKR. The package has Unlimited On-net calls, 350 mins of Off-net calls, 7GB data with unlimited Facebook and unlimited SMS.

call.name: Ufone Super Card Max
call.desc: Ufone Super Card Max comes at a price of 799 PKR. The package has Unlimited On-net calls, 250 mins of Off-net calls, 4GB data with unlimited Facebook, and 4500 SMS.

call.name: Ufone Super Card Plus
call.desc:
Ufone Super Card Plus is an enhanced version of the “Ufone Super Card”. Super card plus comes with added free resources with a validity of one month.
Free resources include 1200 on-net minutes, 180 off-net minutes, 4200 free SMS, and 2000 MBs of the internet including Free Facebook for the entire month.

call.name: Ufone Monthly Pakistan Package
call.desc:
Surf the internet for free and make all the calls you want 24 hours a day, throughout the month!
With Ufone’s massive ‘Monthly Pakistan Offer’. With this exciting offer the entire Pakistan will stay connected through Pakistan’s favorite cellular company – Ufone.
So carry on surfing mobile internet & making calls to all Ufone as well as PTCL & Vfone numbers, anywhere in Pakistan for just Rs. 418 (Incl Tax) month.

otherscall.name: Ufone Mini Super Card
otherscall.desc:
Ufone Super Card Mini is suitable for those who want to keep it bi-monthly with free resources for 15 days.
Ufone Super Card Mini comes with 500 free on-net minutes, 75 off-net minutues, 3500 SMS and 600MBs for 15 days.

otherscall.name: Ufone Super Recharge Offer
otherscall.desc: Get two days of befiqri with Ufone Super Recharge offer.

otherscall.name: Ufone Nayi SIM Offer
otherscall.desc: Buy a new Ufone SIM or switch to Ufone network, dial *1000# and get free WhatsApp for 3 months*. Moreover, on every recharge of Rs. 50 or more within the next 3 months get free 1GB internet, 1GB Facebook, 500 U-U/PTCL minutes and 500 SMS for 5 days.

otherscall.name: Ufone Best Call Offer
otherscall.desc: With Ufone Best Call Offer, Make 2-hour long calls for just Rs. 6 including taxes to any Ufone & PTCL numbers.

otherssms.info: This Offer is available on all prepaid packages.

Ufone is offering one hour of unlimited Ufone to Ufone and Ufone to PTCL minutes, 60 SMS and 60MBs of mobile internet.
All this is charged at Rs. 7 + taxes.
Ufone Power Hour can be subscribed any time and can be subscribed any number of times.

otherssms.name: Ufone International SMS Bucket
otherssms.desc:
Ufone always manages to come up with the absolute best offers for our valued customers. With Ufone International SMS Bucket, customers can enjoy 100 International SMS for 24 hours in just Rs. 5.96 + Tax.

Offer valid for following countries: Afghanistan, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Belgium, Germany, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Iran, Italy, Kuwait, Malaysia, Oman, Philippines, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, South Africa, Spain, Srilanka, Sweden, Tanzania, UAE, and United Kingdom.

internet.desc: Enjoy Ufone super internet plus for just Rs. 499 (load). Subscribe to the Ufone Super Internet Plus Package to get over 8 GB of data, and 5 GB additional for Whatsapp for the whole month.

internet.name: Ufone Monthly Heavy
internet.desc:
Ufone’s Monthly Heavy 3GB 3G/4G internet package is suitable for those with excessive data usage. As the name suggests, it comes with 3GB of monthly data limit and 2 GB’s of Social Bundle which costs Rs. 780 per month.
WhatsApp calls will be charged on the default Mobile Internet rate.
Freebies: Facebook, Whatsapp, Line, and Twitter.

internet.name: Ufone Monthly Max
internet.desc:
This is Ufone’s best 3G offer that comes with 2GB’s of Social Bundle and 10GB of data limit per month. With Ufone’s monthly 10GB offer you can remain connected with mobile internet all day long.
Ufone’s Monthly 10GB internet package comes with a charge of Rs. 1,560 per month.
Freebies: Facebook, Whatsapp, Line and Twitter
WhatsApp calls will be charged on default Mobile Internet rate.
Subscription fee: Rs. 1560 (load)

othersinternet.name: Ufone Nayi Sim Double Offer
othersinternet.desc:
Buy a new Ufone SIM or switch to the Ufone network, dial *141# and on recharge of Super Card Gold (Rs. 999), Super Card Plus (Rs. 599), or Super Card (Rs. 570) get Double resources for the same price.

On recharge of Super Card Gold (Rs. 999)
8,000 Minutes for Ufone/PTCL
700 Minutes for Other Network
14 GB Internet
7 GB Facebook
10,000 SMS

On recharge of Super Card Plus (Rs. 599)
2,400 Minutes for Ufone/PTCL
360 Minutes for Other Networks
4,000 MB Internet
5 GB Facebook
8,400 SMS
